Hr. John H. Lerch
Page 2
December 23, 1954
Once again my regrets that we do not now seem to be in a position to
make use of the sort of project you have to offer, and best wishes
for your finding something which will be both profitable and satisÂ¬
fying. Best wishes for the holiday season.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
HJSsop
CCs Robert Hudson, ETRC
John Holt
